channel.description: Recent content in Os2 on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: Down the memory lane with OS/2
item.author: julio@meroh.net (Julio Merino)
item.description: OS/2 Warp 3 was the operating system that led me into an adventure back in 1994. This OS made me escape MS-DOS and Windows, and then made me enter the Linux world when I couldn’t afford Warp 4. Let’s walk down the memory lane!
